properties.name: itumate.app.msg.service
properties.description: itumate msg 服务名称,请取默认值 msg-v1

properties.name: msg-v1.ribbon.ConnectTimeout
properties.description: itumate Msg-V1 服务连接超时时间

properties.name: msg-v1.ribbon.ReadTimeout
properties.description: itumate Msg-V1 服务读取超时时间

properties.name: msg-v1.ribbon.OkToRetryOnAllOperations
properties.description: 是否为 itumate Msg-V1 服务所有操作开启连接重试机制

properties.name: msg-v1.ribbon.MaxAutoRetrys
properties.description: itumate Msg-V1 最大重试次数

properties.name: msg-v1.ribbon.MaxAutoRetriesNextServer
properties.description: itumate Msg-V1 重试发送,更换节点最大值

properties.name: hystrix.command.mailSendApi.execution.isolation.thread.timeoutInMinlliseconds
properties.description: itumate Msg-V1 熔断器超时时间,该值必须大于 msg-v1.ribbon.ReadTimeout
